Description:
Relaxed Coastal Living
Set in a lovely quiet court on a lush and gently sloping allotment of approximately 789 square metres is this fabulous single level home providing a comfortable floor plan with lovely spacious rooms. The immaculately presented home is positioned beautifully on the block to make the most of the warm northerly aspect with the kitchen and living areas designed to overlook the vast green lawn and garden. The kitchen is well appointed with great storage and plenty of bench space and is central to both living areas which makes entertaining a breeze. From the main living area a sliding door opens to a private and covered alfresco area overlooking the tranquil environment.
The master bedroom has a fabulous dressing room and great size ensuite while the remaining two bedrooms and family bathroom are located off the main living area to the rear of the home. The living area has a cosy wood fire, split system heating and cooling and carpet throughout providing a really relaxing space.
Outdoors the property is fully fenced with double gates for access to a single carport and a concrete driveway leads to the double garage with remote control doors. There is also a storage shed at the rear.
With the shops, beaches and schools only minutes away and only a short walk to the RSL, this property presents an amazing opportunity and would suit as a great coastal permanent home or weekend retreat!
Insights: 6 Eucalypt Close, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2020 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Atlantis has Risen!
An excellent opportunity has become available in the highly sought-after White Sands Estate. This 648 m² allotment (approx.), with great frontage and titled ready to be built on immediately, allows the Savvy buyer to create their dream home, Holiday House or just simply add to their portfolio.
Located next to a neighbouring park and within minutes drive to all the cows has to offer, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, this allotment has everything going for it.
Parcels of land this size don't become available often in this estate, so don't miss your chance to secure your piece of the Phillip Island lifestyle in this amazing estate.
This property is proudly presented to the market by the team at RayWhite - Phillip Island

Description:
Central Living by the sea
This private apartment is to the rear of the building, hidden from the hustle and bustle of life in a busy street. Located on the second level, only 50m from the pristine shoreline of the north facing Cowes Beach and a short walk along the Esplanade to cafes, shops restaurants, jetty and park.
Consisting of new flooring, renovated kitchen, which is open plan to the dining and living areas, two generous bedrooms with plenty of storage plus an undercover car parking space with lock up storage.
A deck through double doors promotes a side view of the ocean.
First to see will buy.

Description:
Titled land in Seagrove estate
Titled land in Seagrove Estate! This level 666m2 (approx.) block is ready for you to build your dream home on.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip island to provide this service.
All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block. Located only 700 metres to Cowes north facing bay beaches and walking distance to the main street of Cowes and schools.
This block wont last long.

Description:
A Rare Find! A Fabulous Lifestyle Property!
Presenting a fabulous opportunity to acquire five beautiful acres of land, a rare find, comprising a substantial home in Cowes and only a few minutes drive to the shops, beaches, Grand Prix Circuit and much much more. A long driveway takes you up to the home which is situated at the rear of the property on this gently rising allotment. The much loved double storey home of brick construction has been in the same family for many years and has been well maintained. A wide and light filled entry welcomes you into the lower level of the home where you will find two spacious living areas, the laundry and a bathroom with spa bath. The huge garage, large enough to also house a tractor, has double roller doors and internal access into the home. The upper level of the home comprises a comfortable living space featuring a wood fire, ceiling fans and beautiful polished timber floors, which is adjacent to the well appointed kitchen and dining area, each having sliding doors out to either a large covered entertaining area or the sunny balcony both with magnificent rural views.
Also on this level are four good sized bedrooms each with robes including the master bedroom with an ensuite and a family bathroom. Each of the bedrooms on the west side have a sliding door to the wide sun drenched balcony.
The garden surrounding the home has a small vineyard as well as some fruit trees and there is plenty of room to add additional shedding for storage. The mostly cleared land in front of the home provides many options for someone desiring acreage of this size. This is a great opportunity for a tradesperson requiring a large space or a family looking for a peaceful lifestyle change.
Please phone Yvette on 0414 506 795 to arrange a Private Inspection or Virtual Tour
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Phillip Island.

Description:
Spacious Central Living
It's not often you will come across a home that ticks all the boxes and is centrally located! This home offers an abundance of potential and is waiting for it's next owner to enjoy and make many happy memories in.
Situated on a large 596sqm allotment in a quiet street, this lovely property is an ideal first home, investment opportunity or holiday house with plenty of space for the entire family.
Comprising of three huge bedrooms, master with walk through robe & ensuite, open plan living, kitchen & dining, bathroom with separate toilet and laundry.
Other great features include stunning exposed timber beams throughout, cosy wood fire in the family room, undercover deck area, reverse cycle heating and cooling, fully fenced yard, and clear access to the rear perfect for your boat, jetski and caravan space for all your toys!
This home is in a fantastic location within easy walking distance to central Cowes, foreshore beaches, cafes and restaurants.
Ideal for holiday or permanent living, this property offers an ideal investment opportunity.

Description:
Immaculate home ready for summer
Designed with the family in mind to relax and enjoy the Island lifestyle this immaculate home is ready to go for summer.
Featuring three spacious bedrooms (master with ensuite), all with built in robes and another centrally located bathroom give room for all the family.
Open plan living areas with a light filled modern kitchen, Caesar stone bench tops, soft closing drawers and walk in pantry adds to the appeal of this property.
Heating & cooling is controlled by the ducted reverse cycle system to all rooms, including the bathroom along with solar power, double glazed windows and numerous skylights to finish off the 6 star rating.
Close to the beach and town make this a must inspect home,there is nothing to do but enjoy.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
As soon as you step inside you'll be taken aback by the amount of natural light this spacious family home captures. The 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom property is sure to please the fussiest of buyers. The main kitchen, dining and living area is the focal point of the home, complete with raked ceilings, polished hardwood oak floors and reverse cycle heating/cooling. All doors from the 2 living areas open up to the central deck, which overlooks the immaculate rear garden so it's perfect for entertaining family & friends. The home is ideal for family living with a completely separate rear living zone with study nook which runs off the 2 other bedrooms. Other features include highlight windows throughout, architectural roof design which allows Winter sun to stream into the lounge areas. Ceiling fans in all bedrooms and living areas, plenty of storage space, large laundry area, internal access from the double garage, 2 reverse cycle split systems, 4.5kw Solar Power Unit, established gardens, boat or caravan storage, plus many more features completes this architectural designed home.

Description:
CURRENT BID $ 900 k with 5 QUALIFIED BIDDERS
CURRENT BID $ 900 k with 5 QUALIFIED BIDDERS. The property has not met reserve. The Openn Negotiation is underway (online auction with flexible terms for qualified buyers) and the property can sell as early as tomorrow. Contact Leo Edwards immediately on 0472 523 445 to become qualified and avoid disappointment.
Locations in Cowes don't come any better than this! If you've ever dreamed of waking up and jumping straight in the ocean, this could be your dream home. Secluded and private, yet only moments from the town centre of Cowes this large multi purpose family home ticks all the boxes.
Clever design elements allow the zoning of the property, ideal for providing income in the summer months or long visits from the extended family, who will definitely be coming to visit you when you live here! Spacious single level living is possible on the first floor with high curved ceilings in the large living / dining area leading out to the huge sun terrace that looks out over the reserve towards the ocean. You'll feel like a king or a queen in the expansive master suite with its own balcony, ensuite bathroom and walk in robe.
The ground floor offers up just as much space comprising of four bedrooms all with built in robes, a large family bathroom with custom power shower and deep corner spa bath and very spacious multi purpose living area with patio access to the gardens.
If you've been searching for a beach house in one of Phillip Island's premier locations that offers space, practicality, backdoor beach access and great income potential!

Description:
TITLED AND READY TO BUILD FOR WATER VIEWS
Build your dream home now!
Take advantage of up to 50K in current government grants to secure this prestige block in Cowes premium Seagrove Estate, and build your dream home now. This large block is in the last and final stage of Seagrove Estate, and has a prominent North facing position overlooking the Estate, with potential water and backs onto rural land with sweeping views of the majestic landscape
This North facing block of land is located in the Seagrove estate, This prime allotment has the potential of bay views from a second storey home. With a 16m Frontage and 513m2(approx.) This allotment is titled and ready to build.
Enjoy the amenities Seagrove has to offer such as parks, playgrounds, walking tracks and Waterways, as well as underground plumbed LPG gas to all allotments.
Services including NBN, mains and recycled water, sewer, underground power and plumbed LPG gas is available to the allotment.
Located only 700 metres to Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools.
With limited availability of land and no future residential land being released in Cowes for the foreseeable future, act fast to secure this block act fast and take full advantage of the current Government grants. Take the stress out of building with a fixed price contract from one of the many highly respected local and volume builders, enquire today as this block wont last long!

Description:
OPPOSITE THE GOLF COURSE
Your new property is set back from the main road with private access off the service road.
Access can be gained through the large double remote garage or the front porch that opens into a large open living plan that looks out to the golf course. This huge living space offers a quiet and private lounge room with a jet master gas heater that is central to the living space and a split system for additional heating and cooling. A large open country kitchen adjoins this space with large bench spaces and a breakfast bar.The second living space is large with a computer area and opens out to a private undercover deck area. Three large bedrooms and second bathroom are situated at the back for privacy. The master bedroom offers full ensuite.

Description:
Exemplary in Design
On offer is this beautifully presented, four-bedroom family home in the popular Seagrove Estate of Cowes. With multiple living zones, a spacious layout and low maintenance beautifully landscaped gardens, this property is ready for its new owners to move straight in and enjoy their new lifestyle.
The home features four generously sized bedrooms, all with built in robes and ceiling fans, the master with walk in robe and full ensuite, the main bathroom with separate toilet, two living areas and the central open plan kitchen/living/dining area complimented with stainless steel appliances, 900ml electric oven and gas cooktop.
Flowing out from the meals area is the fully covered alfresco/entertaining decking complete with panel heating and cafe blinds to ensure year-round enjoyment.
Other features include; electric double garage, ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, theatre room and carpet and tile flooring throughout.
All of this on a 651sqm approx., low maintenance, fully fenced allotment.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Bright Coastal, Contemporary Unit In Central Cowes
On offer is this solid brick veneer unit, situated in a quiet block of three and conveniently positioned just one block from a quiet, north facing child-friendly beach and only a short 10 minute (700m) walk to the shops and cafes.
Also ideally located within a short drive from major tourist attractions including the Nobbies, Penguin Parade, Koala Conservation Centre and Churchill Island. And for guests visiting the Moto GP or other major events at the Phillip island Grand Prix Circuit, there is also a special bus servicing the event that stops just up the street from the property.
Recently renovated, the unit has been transformed into a contemporary living space, featuring plenty of natural light, neutral colour scheme and modern conveniences.
Comprising of open plan living, with a stunning new kitchen featuring stone bench tops, soft close drawers and dishwasher, two bedrooms, study nook / home office space, and a sleek, spacious bathroom
Additional features include a 26 panel solar system, low maintenance front garden, private courtyard, external awnings, split system heating/cooling, lock up single garage incorporating laundry, that has direct access to the unit.
All the hard work has been done for you, making this ideal for holiday, permanent living or as a profitable addition to your investment portfolio - and has been returning solid holiday rental income for the current owners.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Stylish Family Home by the Park
This lovely 2 storey family home features 4 bedrooms plus study, 2 main living zones and is ideally located within the popular Shearwater Estate.
Ground-level entry to a wonderful family room with large windows take in views of the park, thru to the dining room and contemporary kitchen with full walk-in-pantry, Island bench and 900mm s/steel electric oven and cooktop.
There is a great sense of style and function throughout this home, free-flowing indoor-outdoor living space means the kitchen and dining flow beautifully onto the large timber deck making fabulous outdoor entertaining a breeze.
This is a functional and well thought out floorplan that will appeal to buyers of all ages. The master bedroom complete with ensuite, walk-in robe, and separate toilet are also located ground floor, reducing the need to climb stairs.
Tailored for comfortable living and thereby ensuring that everyone has their own space, the second level comprises a large second living room with views across the park, a study, and 3 further bedrooms with BIR’s serviced by the family bathroom complete with shower, bath and double basins with separate toilet.
Other features include multi-split system heating and cooling units in the master bedroom, lounge and dining rooms and a 4-way ceiling cassette upstairs ensures you climate comfort all year round. The property has a fully fenced back garden set on 471m2 approx corner block, garden shed, and an enclosed carport with direct entry into the walk-in-pantry.
This is a home to grow your young family or enjoy the benefits of a holiday home within 90 minutes of Melbourne. Close proximity to Cowes Golf Club, Silverleaves beach, Ten Pin Bowling and within a few minute's drive you have everything Cowes has to offer, Cafes, restaurants, shops, supermarkets, Medical centre, main beach and pier. Call now to arrange a personal inspection.
Insights: 5 Seagrass Avenue, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2020 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Position Perfect, Potential Plus!
Here is a great opportunity for the first home buyer, investor or holiday home buyer to secure this entry level priced piece of Phillip Island Real Estate. Located in a quiet, established street just a short walk to Red Rocks beach and close to the retail hub of Cowes.
Filled with warmth and an abundance of natural light the interior features an open plan living, dining and kitchen, two comfortable bedrooms and separate bathroom. The North facing front deck is ideal for the BBQ or soaking up the sun. With a generous block size of 779sqm (approx) this represents terrific buying whilst leaving room in the budget to add your own personal touch or further value by extending.
Enormous potential and an outstanding opportunity in a sought after location.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

Description:
Everything So Close!
With all the hard work done, this single level, recently updated home is the perfect opportunity for those looking to secure a prime piece of property in the heart of Cowes. Being only a short walk to the beaches, shops, cafes, supermarkets, primary school and all of what the township has to offer, this home will appeal to many.
The home features three bedrooms, the master with walk in robe, a modern bathroom/laundry and open plan living/kitchen/dining area complete with stainless steel dishwasher, induction cooktop and electric oven.
Step out through the sliding doors and onto the fully covered, north facing entertaining decking which overlooks the private and quiet surrounds.
Other features include; new split system heating and cooling, freshly polished timber and new tile flooring throughout, brand new appliances and cabinets to the kitchen, complete new bathroom and updated compliant electrics. Garden shed.
The site has the potential to be subdivided (STCA).
All of this set within a 671sqm approx. fully fenced allotment.
This property is vacant and available for immediate occupancy.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Newly titled Seagrove lot - opposite parkland
This newly titled block of land is perfectly positioned fronting parkland in the prestigious Seagrove estate. The level 529 square metre (approx.) block is ready for you to build.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service.
All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available to the block. Located less than a kilometre to Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Enquire today.

Description:
Newly Titled Block in Seagrove Estate
This newly titled 425 square metre block (approx.) is located in the prestigious Seagrove Estate and and is located close to the estate's parklands, playgrounds and walking tracks as well as the main street and beach.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
The Seagrove Estate features underground gas (LPG), recycled water, and super fast optic fibre connections to the National Broadband Network. Now titled and ready to build on.
Environmentally-sensitive coastal living by awardwinning designers. Seagrove is only 800 metres from the main street and even closer to the beach. Visit www.seagrove.com.au
